name: places/ChIJ9bkQ0pxZwokRvT9CEDA4FF4
adrFormatAddress: 91 1st Ave., New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
I can't think of a more deserving five star review!  This place has everything when it comes to spices.  I mean everything--saffron, Bay leaves, Indian spices, Spanish spices, all kinds of salt, etc.  Great deals on bulk items like rice and lemon juice as well.  They also have a very good beer selection.

Friendly, helpful staff!

Highly recommended!!!

originalText.text: Very rude manager. Prices are insane. And when trying to talk to the manager since I was buying bulk amount he even raised the price in front of me from what he originally told me ! You've lost a very good customer. Not ever buying here or your branches again! I'm completely dissatisfied.

You've lost a very good customer. Not ever buying here or your branches again! I'm completely dissatisfied.

originalText.text: This is an amazing store. A massive selection of quality herbs and spices, tinctures, body care products, large selection of honey, Indian foods, grains, flat breads, Roti, incense, skin care, tooth care, treats, even excellent mango lassee drink, teas, assorted rice. You name it. In east village on first ave near 5th street  Right next to some great Indian Restaurants adorned with colored string lights.  Great products, great service and great ambiance

text.text: This is an amazing store. A massive selection of quality herbs and spices, tinctures, body care products, large selection of honey, Indian foods, grains, flat breads, Roti, incense, skin care, tooth care, treats, even excellent mango lassee drink, teas, assorted rice. You name it. In east village on first ave near 5th street  Right next to some great Indian Restaurants adorned with colored string lights.  Great products, great service and great ambiance

originalText.text: If I could provide 0 stars I would. This man was very very rude to me. After I called about a product and inquired about its price, I walked into the store to purchase the item. As I walked towards the front, I tried to confirm the price because the price on the product was different from what he quoted me over the phone, it was just a little but higher but no big deal, at that point, I still intended to purchase it. Then I asked him about it once more just in case there was perhaps a mistake, and the guy waved me off and said, "I told you the price now just pay for it." I walked back and placed the product back onto the shelf and walked back over to him and told him that I would never shop at this store. EVER. I told him that was a rude thing to say, especially to a potentially new customer, he acted clueless then said,  "How was I rude? I told you the price. I told you to pay. How am I rude? I'm not rude." Then waved at me again. I just looked at him and walked out of the store and immediately wrote this review. Funny enough, I saw him present himself completely differently with the white man in front of me. Go figure. Needless to say, I do NOT recommend this store at all unless, well... maybe if you're white. Otherwise, STAY FAR AWAY! You've been warned.

originalText.text: This place has almost everything and anything you need. Great quality great price. No matter where you live in the city, this place is worth the trip. It is a tight squeeze getting through the isles though. Trust me, you want to know this shop. Although it can be dangerous because you’ll want to try everything.
